fullText: Jessica Lange delivers a towering performance as morphine-addicted Mary Tyrone, bringing both fragility and fierce intelligence to O'Neill's tormented matriarch.
dtliExcerpt: Jessica Lange delivers a towering performance as morphine-addicted Mary Tyrone, bringing both fragility and fierce intelligence to O'Neill's tormented matriarch.
